title: Olay 2-In-1 Advanced Ribbons Firming Butter + Advanced Moisture Body Wash 18 Oz (Pack of 3)
Burt's Bees More Moisture Baobab Shampoo, 10 Fluid Ounces
description: Naturally restore more, more, more moisture to your hair with our more moisture shampoo. It's specially formulated to gently add shine to lackluster locks while increasing moisture and manageability. Enhanced with baobab oil and cupuaçu butter, both known sources of essential fatty acids and antioxidants, this moisturizing shampoo will leave your hair soft, smooth and beautiful.
